We use cookies to help you navigate efficiently and perform certain functions. You will find detailed information about all cookies under each consent category below.
The cookies that are categorized as "Necessary" are stored on your browser as they are essential for enabling the basic functionalities of the site. ... 
For more information on how Google's third-party cookies operate and handle your data, see: Google Privacy Policy
Cookie
cf_clearance
Duration
1 year
Description
Clearance Cookie stores the proof of challenge passed. It is used to no longer issue a challenge if present. It is required to reach an origin server.
Cookie
_wpfuuid
Duration
1 year 1 month 4 days
Description
This cookie is used by the WPForms WordPress plugin. The cookie is used to allows the paid version of the plugin to connect entries by the same user and is used for some additional features like the Form Abandonment addon.
Cookie
elementor
Duration
Never Expires
Description
The website's WordPress theme uses this cookie. It allows the website owner to implement or change the website's content in real-time.
Cookie
cookieyes-consent
Duration
1 year
Description
CookieYes sets this cookie to remember users' consent preferences so that their preferences are respected on subsequent visits to this site. It does not collect or store any personal information about the site visitors.
Cookie
_wpfuj
Duration
1 year
Description
The _wpfuj cookie is typically used to store user preferences or session data for a website. This cookie helps enhance the user experience by remembering user-specific settings or information during their visit to the website.
Cookie
lidc
Duration
1 day
Description
LinkedIn sets the lidc cookie to facilitate data center selection.
Cookie
li_gc
Duration
6 months
Description
Linkedin set this cookie for storing visitor's consent regarding using cookies for non-essential purposes.
Cookie
yt-remote-device-id
Duration
Never Expires
Description
YouTube sets this cookie to store the user's video preferences using embedded YouTube videos.
Cookie
ytidb::LAST_RESULT_ENTRY_KEY
Duration
Never Expires
Description
The cookie ytidb::LAST_RESULT_ENTRY_KEY is used by YouTube to store the last search result entry that was clicked by the user. This information is used to improve the user experience by providing more relevant search results in the future.
Cookie
yt-remote-connected-devices
Duration
Never Expires
Description
YouTube sets this cookie to store the user's video preferences using embedded YouTube videos.
Cookie
yt-remote-session-app
Duration
session
Description
The yt-remote-session-app cookie is used by YouTube to store user preferences and information about the interface of the embedded YouTube video player.
Cookie
yt-remote-cast-installed
Duration
session
Description
The yt-remote-cast-installed cookie is used to store the user's video player preferences using embedded YouTube video.
Cookie
yt-remote-session-name
Duration
session
Description
The yt-remote-session-name cookie is used by YouTube to store the user's video player preferences using embedded YouTube video.
Cookie
yt-remote-fast-check-period
Duration
session
Description
The yt-remote-fast-check-period cookie is used by YouTube to store the user's video player preferences for embedded YouTube videos.
Cookie
gtm_pageview_count
Duration
1 month
Description
The gtm_pageview_count cookie is utilized to track the number of pages a user visits on a website. This cookie helps in understanding user engagement and behavior by counting the page views during a user’s session.
Cookie
_ga_*
Duration
1 year 1 month 4 days
Description
Google Analytics sets this cookie to store and count page views.
Cookie
_ga
Duration
1 year 1 month 4 days
Description
Google Analytics sets this cookie to calculate visitor, session and campaign data and track site usage for the site's analytics report. The cookie stores information anonymously and assigns a randomly generated number to recognise unique visitors.
Cookie
_clck
Duration
1 year
Description
Microsoft Clarity sets this cookie to retain the browser's Clarity User ID and settings exclusive to that website. This guarantees that actions taken during subsequent visits to the same website will be linked to the same user ID.
Cookie
_hjSessionUser_*
Duration
1 year
Description
Hotjar sets this cookie to ensure data from subsequent visits to the same site is attributed to the same user ID, which persists in the Hotjar User ID, which is unique to that site.
Cookie
_hjSession_*
Duration
1 hour
Description
Hotjar sets this cookie to ensure data from subsequent visits to the same site is attributed to the same user ID, which persists in the Hotjar User ID, which is unique to that site.
Cookie
_clsk
Duration
1 day
Description
Microsoft Clarity sets this cookie to store and consolidate a user's pageviews into a single session recording.
Cookie
_fbp
Duration
3 months
Description
Facebook sets this cookie to display advertisements when either on Facebook or on a digital platform powered by Facebook advertising after visiting the website.
Cookie
CLID
Duration
1 year
Description
Microsoft Clarity set this cookie to store information about how visitors interact with the website. The cookie helps to provide an analysis report. The data collection includes the number of visitors, where they visit the website, and the pages visited.
Cookie
SM
Duration
session
Description
Microsoft Clarity cookie set this cookie for synchronizing the MUID across Microsoft domains.
Cookie
MR
Duration
7 days
Description
This cookie, set by Bing, is used to collect user information for analytics purposes.
Cookie
_gcl_au
Duration
3 months
Description
Google Tag Manager sets the cookie to experiment advertisement efficiency of websites using their services.
Cookie
SRM_B
Duration
1 year 24 days
Description
Used by Microsoft Advertising as a unique ID for visitors.
Cookie
bcookie
Duration
1 year
Description
LinkedIn sets this cookie from LinkedIn share buttons and ad tags to recognize browser IDs.
Cookie
YSC
Duration
session
Description
Youtube sets this cookie to track the views of embedded videos on Youtube pages.
Cookie
VISITOR_INFO1_LIVE
Duration
6 months
Description
YouTube sets this cookie to measure bandwidth, determining whether the user gets the new or old player interface.
Cookie
VISITOR_PRIVACY_METADATA
Duration
6 months
Description
YouTube sets this cookie to store the user's cookie consent state for the current domain. 
Cookie
MUID
Duration
1 year 24 days
Description
Bing sets this cookie to recognise unique web browsers visiting Microsoft sites. This cookie is used for advertising, site analytics, and other operations.
Cookie
ANONCHK
Duration
10 minutes
Description
The ANONCHK cookie, set by Bing, is used to store a user's session ID and verify ads' clicks on the Bing search engine. The cookie helps in reporting and personalization as well.
Cookie
test_cookie
Duration
15 minutes
Description
doubleclick.net sets this cookie to determine if the user's browser supports cookies.
Cookie
IDE
Duration
1 year 24 days 1 minute
Description
Google DoubleClick IDE cookies store information about how the user uses the website to present them with relevant ads according to the user profile.

Support: Get Trusted Support and After-sales Service
What is Absen’s Maintenance Service? 
Maintenance services are tailored to each customer’s screen conditions and requirements, including: module repair, on-site service, regular inspections, spare parts replacement, etc. Service Content: 1. Online Technical Support: Professional online acceptance and fault handling process provided via the service hotline. Upon calling the after-sales service hotline, service experts and R&D quality experts will provide customers with a response and information about specialized online acceptance and troubleshooting process. 2. Faulty Parts Repair: Customers can send faulty parts to Absen’s designated service center for repair. After the faulty parts have been repaired, they will be mailed back to the customer by Absen. 3. On-Site Service: Professional engineers can be dispatched by Absen to perform repairs on-site. 4. Training Service: Training on product knowledge, daily usage, and maintenance 5. Customized Service: Absen provides tailored services based on customer needs.

Put on a Great Show with Absen's Killer Stage Rental Solutions
Absen, a specialist in LED displays and the world’s leading provider of LED display products and services, offers state-of-the-art stage rental solutions to help you captivate and impress your audience. As your premier choice, Absen delivers superior image quality, rock-solid structural integrity, and excellent color reproduction that have helped create thousands of stunning stages and mesmerizing shows.
The LED rental market has witnessed remarkable growth in recent years, reshaping the landscape of event production and visual communication. Stage rental solutions have become the go-to choice for a range of applications, from corporate gatherings and concerts to trade shows and outdoor promotions. One of the key drivers behind this surge is the shift from traditional displays to immersive interactivity, which is particularly evident in live events and concerts, where LED screens enhance the overall ambiance and engage audience through real-time graphics and videos. Additionally, the energy efficiency and durability of LED technology have led to increased adoption, as it is cost effective and aligns with the growing emphasis on sustainability.
Based in the dynamic tech hub of Shenzhen, Absen’s products are exported to more than 140 countries and regions in America, Europe, Australia, Asia, Africa, etc., and have been used in the Presidential press conference, CIIE, FIFA World Cups, NBA games and Times Square. Delivering more than 60,000 installations, Absen produces best in class products for DOOH , rental & staging , commercial display , data visualization, conference display and consumer markets, with the export volume of LED products being NO.1 for 12 consecutive years. Boasting an annual production capacity of 300,000m2 and a strong global after-sales service network, Absen supports its quality products with exceptional services. After all, great events and performances start with great service.
The stage rental solutions launched by Absen, headed by the the Neptune Series, the Jupiter Pro Series, the Polaris V2 Series and the Saturn Series, have undoubtedly contributed significantly to this growth. These new releases have played a critical role in driving the company’s growth and supporting the performance boom, delivering immersive experiences and appeal through cutting-edge design, engagement, flexibility and customization, as well as energy efficiency. The Neptune Series, as the best-selling product of its kind, has sold more than 360,000 panels world-wide. With unmatched production facilities, we offer expedited service and ensure 7-day delivery for all global customers.
Not all stages are created equal. A stage must align with the design, purpose, scale and vibe of the event. It should be creatively and strategically conceptualized. Absen’s stage rental solutions are versatile and can be configured into various shapes and sizes, allowing for creative and customizable designs. This adaptability makes them suitable for a wide range of events, from concerts and trade shows to corporate presentations. Our vast inventory features a comprehensive selection of stage solutions, all tailored to fit any scenes. With 360-degree expertise, Absen has the mastery to craft the perfect and bespoke stage solution to help customers take the show to the next level. Covering industry events, public events, live music, competitions and xR, among others, we have proudly served the Baidu Cloud Intelligence Conference (NT2.6), the European Economic Congress in Katowice (PL2.5 Plus V2), the Fifth World Nomad Games (NT2.9), the Weibo Awards Ceremony (NT2.9) and Volkswagen Touareg Promo (NT2.6), meeting the diversified and stringent demands for stability, consistency, resolution, energy efficiency and color vividness. We ensure immersive experiences and ignited enthusiasm for audience of all events with a visual and auditory feast. With easy and fast assembly and disassembly, we make the stage set-up work a breeze. Most importantly, Absen never disappoints with downtime or power failure. aiming to create experiences audience will never forget.
Baidu Cloud Intelligence Conference (NT2.6) European Economic Congress in Katowice (PL2.5 Plus V2) Fifth World Nomad Games (NT2.9) Weibo Awards Ceremony (NT2.9) Volkswagen Touareg Promo in Brazil (NT2.6) 
Absen LED screens can be customized into various shapes as per the designer’s vision to unleash the full potential of creativity. As a battleground of the future and a breeding ground for creativity, virtual production seamlessly blends the virtual world with the real world in real-time. xR stages, which encompass Virtual Reality (VR), Augmented Reality (AR), and Mixed Reality (MR), are typically equipped with LED backdrop screens and floor tile screens, making them ideal venues for producing music videos, advertisements, television programs, performances, keynote speeches, and online PR. Meticulously crafted, xR solutions, as all other Absen stage solutions, deliver superior visuals, exceptional reliability, and versatile operational flexibility, blurring the line between virtual and real.
Absen products have gained praise from customers across the globe, who expressed that they “have absolute confidence in Absen”, citing that “Absen is a trusted supplier that never fails to deliver”. As one partner puts it, “Absen always stands by our side, offering unwavering support and the best solutions, like a faithful ally. Their solutions are finely tuned to our needs and help us to create the best possible experience for our audience. It is like a safety net that gives us a sense of security.”
We offer nothing but the best performance and the most desirable service. Our innovation, commitment, and reputation in the industry are unmatched. We provide the highest level of event rental services to our valued customers across the world. We listen to the needs of our customers and work unswervingly to meet their every desire for the perfect stage. “We are dedicated to advancing LED display technology and expanding our global footprint. As the demand for high-quality LED displays continues to grow, we are focused on remaining at the forefront, setting new standards for excellence in the industry,” pledged Dr. Deng, Vice President and Head of Product Development, Absen.

Absen's LED GlassFloor Shines at FIBA U19 World Cup
Through groundbreaking design and cutting-edge technology, world-leading LED display manufacturer, Absen, partnered with pioneering sports flooring specialists, ASB GlassFloor, to supply its LED technology for the portable ASB GlassFloor system used in the 2023 FIBA U19 Women’s Basketball World Cup in Madrid.
Held biennially, the U19 Women’s Basketball World Cup featured the top 16 qualifying youth women’s national teams from around the world, who competed in a 56-game tournament during the month of July.
As one of the proud hosts of the event, the WiZink Center, home arena of Real Madrid’s basketball team, wanted to ensure the venue delivered an unforgettable and fully immersive experience for both players and spectators. In doing so, the venue enlisted the help of German sports floor solution specialists, ASB GlassFloor to install its innovative full size digital LED glass floor, displaying not only court lines for play, but also imagery and video.
GlassFloor chose Absen’s award-winning LED technology. The high-performance and high-definition LED panels feature high-grade electronics and advanced mechanical design. Specifically designed for live events, virtual production and XR stages, the panels support HDR (High Dynamic Range) display, capable of producing more realistic and colourful images. Absen’s LED panels also boast a thin design which also allows for easy operation and installation, and they are suited to available for both indoor and outdoor applications.
“We strategically selected Absen as our LED supplier due to the impressive quality of their products and the company’s outstanding customer service. Absen has been a professional partner, providing continuous support and the product quality required to achieve the desired results.”, explains Christof Babinsky, Managing Director of ASB GlassFloor.
With the help of Absen’s LED screens, the digital court has unlocked boundless avenues for dynamic and interactive fan engagement, advertising potentials, player tracking and enhanced event presentation with the help of team logos, sponsor advertisements, and visually striking graphics, enhancing the game experience for everyone.
With the use of this technology, which was made possible by the FIBA Central Board’s implemented rule change in 2022, to allow the use of LED glass flooring at Level 1 competitions, the floor has been successfully implemented in several events already and will be used for future competitions thanks to the floor’s ability to be dismantled and installed for a range of rental opportunities.
“This partnership marks a transformative milestone in the world of sport. We’re delighted with the outcome and exceptional experience it provided for the monumental occasion and future tournaments players and spectators can look forward to,” explains Emma Liu, General Manager of AbsenLive Business Division for Absen. “It demonstrates the extensive capabilities of Absen products and our exceeding ability to provide innovative and exhilarating solutions for a wide range of sporting environments.”
“We are delighted with the results. Players, coaches, broadcasters and organisers at the FIBA U19 Women’s Basketball World Cup have been excited and honoured to be part of the premiere of the ground-breaking ASB GlassFloor in professional sports. Sports and AV professionals are now convinced this is the future for indoor sports.” says Christof Babinsky.

Understanding Absen Official Site Cookie Policy

Last Updated: 23-Jul-2024

What are cookies?

This Cookie Policy explains what cookies are and how we use them, the types of cookies we use i.e, the information we collect using cookies and how that information is used, and how to manage the cookie settings.
Cookies are small text files that are used to store small pieces of information. They are stored on your device when the website is loaded on your browser. These cookies help us make the website function properly, make it more secure, provide better user experience, and understand how the website performs and to analyze what works and where it needs improvement.
How do we use cookies?

As most of the online services, our website uses first-party and third-party cookies for several purposes. First-party cookies are mostly necessary for the website to function the right way, and they do not collect any of your personally identifiable data.
The third-party cookies used on our website are mainly for understanding how the website performs, how you interact with our website, keeping our services secure, providing advertisements that are relevant to you, and all in all providing you with a better and improved user experience and help speed up your future interactions with our website.

Micro LED Technology
Integrating multiple Absen image optimization technologies, the X Series enhances the clarity and visibility to bring out natural details and vivid colors for realistic and incredible images.
All-in-One Design with Delicate Details
The X Series comes as a complete kit ready to install, including controller, audio, PSU and all necessary display elements needed for the installation. There’s no need for complex wiring and debugging, it’s easy to install and use. The design of lift type control box satisfies the 97% above high screen ratio and the convenience of installation and maintenance.
Step Into the Future Where Accuracy Meets Interactivity
Equipped with a high-precision infrared touch system, the X Series revolutionizes interactivity and elevating user engagement. With 1mm touch accuracy and support for 20-point multi-touch and smart gestures, it delivers seamless and intuitive interactions.
*The touchscreen functionality cannot be enabled when an external device is connected via HDMI.
Compatible with Crestron, Extron, Yealink Ecosystem
The Absen X Series is fully compatible with Crestron, Extron, and Yealink ecosystems, allowing for easy deployment without complex installations. Designed to provide professional video conferencing solutions, the X Series ensures seamless integration and reliable performance, making it an ideal choice for corporate meetings. Enjoy a streamlined setup and an exceptional visual experience across all platforms.
Intelligent System with Upgraded Performance
The X Series comes with a standard Android 11.0 operating system. A Windows operating system is available through an additional OPS computer. An ultra-large memory and a powerful 4-core processor are included for a smooth and fast performance for wireless screen mirroring from phones, computers, and other devices.
√Android 11.0 / Windows 10 (optional) √4G+32G
Durability in Demanding Spaces
The panel-type COB encapsulation technology effectively protects the display from external impact. The ultra-long service life of 100,000 hours providing a lower cost of ownership and reduced carbon foot print.
Modular Design, Flexible Installation
The modular design enables it to be easily transported to offices and in elevators. The X Series can be mounted on a wall or on a mobile stand, or on the innovative electric lifting bracket for height adjustment. The design of the lift type control box satisfies the 97% above high screen ratio and the convenience of installation and maintenance.

CPK Series-Commercial Display-For enterprise applications display| Absen
Aspect ratio and lightweight design
The CPK series, for all commercial display applications, is available in 1.25mm, 1.56mm pixel pitches. Boasting a 16:9 aspect ratio, the panel ensures peak visual performance, perfect for standard video formats. Its slim profile measures just 43mm in depth, with a lightweight design at 22kg/m². 
· Pixel Pitch: 1.25mm, 1.56mm 
· Panel dimension: 600(W)*337.5(H)*43(D)mm

CPS Series-Commercial Display-For enterprise applications display| Absen
The Fusion of Minimalism & Hive-Engineered Precision
The CPS series, for all commercial display applications, is available in 1.8mm, 2mm, 2.5mm, 3mm pixel pitches. Inspired by hive structure and modern mecha-style, our product unites bold lines with a dynamic attitude. The hive symbolizes exceptional structural engineering and optimal space utilization, elevating product strength and durability. Its distinctive yet minimalist design is a testament to Absen's unceasing dedication to innovation and excellence in the LED industry. 
· Pixel Pitch: 1.8mm, 2mm, 2.5mm, 3mm 
· Panel dimension: 320(W)*480(H)*46.5(D)mm, 320(W)*240(H)*46.5(D)mm
